entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:12 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
